TextView.android:text: 2-3 Muscle Ups (r)
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
3 Muscle Ups (b) ---> 4 Muscle Ups (p) ---> 6 Muscle Ups (g)
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups ---> 20 Dips ---> 10 Chin Ups ---> 20 Straight Bar Dips
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
12 Skull Crushers ---> 15 Russian Push Ups
x3 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 second L-Sit Hold
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
6-7x 90kg Squats
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
8-12x 60kg Front Squats
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 50kg Squats
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 50kg One-Legged Calf Raises ---> Max 30kg One-Legged Calf Raises
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
Optional: Max Push Ups ---> 5 Front Lever Raises ---> 15 seconds Front Lever Tuck (x5 Sets, 2 mins rest inbetween sets)
3-4 Muscle Ups (r) ---> 4 Muscle Ups (b) ---> 8 Muscle Ups (g)
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
2-3 Muscle Ups (r) ---> 3 Muscle Ups (b) ---> 7 Muscle Ups (g)
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1-2 Muscle Ups (r) ---> 2 Muscle Ups (b) ---> 6 Muscle Ups (g)
x2 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
8x 20kg Dips ---> 9x 10kg Dips ---> 10 Dips
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Toes to Bar ---> 5 Bar Leg Raises ---> 5 Bar Knee Raises
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
Max Muscle Ups (r)
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Muscle Ups (b)
x2 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Muscle Ups (p)
x2 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
20x 50kg Squats ---> 8x 20kg Pull Ups
x3-4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Pull Ups + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold
x3-4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Intermediate Program Level 1 - Week 5
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
Repeat the weekly routine until you can achieve 7-10 Muscle Ups on the red band, without breaking the set.
